name: Google Contacts - compact display (updated, fork)
description: Changes the "Google Contacts" UI to a compact style.

user.name: Steven Saus
user.about: Steven Saus injects people with radioactivity as his day job, but only to serve the forces of good. He is an author, sociologist, publisher, and nuclear medicine technologist living in Dayton, Ohio. His first venture into writing and publishing was while in second grade using a mimeograph machine. He has been writing ever since. He blogs at Ideatrash.
